template.name: bnd
template.description: Binds the this of a method. To be used inside a constructor

template.name: con
template.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props as arguments

template.name: conc
template.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props and context as arguments

template.name: cdc
template.description: Error boundaries catch errors during rendering, in lifecycle methods, and in constructors of the whole tree below them.

template.name: cdm
template.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

template.name: cdup
template.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

template.name: props
template.description: Access component's props

template.name: ren
template.description: When called, it should examine this.props and this.state and return a single child element.

template.name: ssf
template.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

template.name: sst
template.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

template.name: state
template.description: Access component's state

template.name: cwm
template.description: Invoked once, both on the client and server, immediately before the initial rendering occurs

template.name: cwr
template.description: Invoked when a component is receiving new props. This method is not called for the initial render. [DEPRECATION NOTE]: This method is deprecated in React 16.3

template.name: cwun
template.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

template.name: cwup
template.description: Invoked immediately before rendering when new props or state are being received. [DEPRECATION NOTE]: This method is deprecated in React 16.3

template.name: rdp
template.description: Creates empty defaultProps declaration

template.name: disp
template.description: Adds the redux mapDispatchToProps function

template.name: est
template.description: Creates empty state object. To be used in a constructor.

template.name: fcc
template.description: Creates a React component class with FlowTypes

template.name: fsc
template.description: Creates a stateless React component with FlowTypes and ES6 module system

template.name: fsf
template.description: Creates a stateless React component as a named function with FlowTypes

template.name: gdsfp
template.description: Invoked after a component is instantiated as well as when it receives new props.

template.name: gsbu
template.description: Invoked right before the most recently rendered output is committed to e.g. the DOM. It enables your component to capture current values

template.name: pta
template.description: Array prop type

template.name: ptao
template.description: An array of a certain type

template.name: ptaor
template.description: An array of a certain type required

template.name: ptar
template.description: Array prop type required

template.name: ptb
template.description: Bool prop type

template.name: ptbr
template.description: Bool prop type required

template.name: ptel
template.description: React element prop type

template.name: ptelr
template.description: React element prop type required

template.name: pte
template.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum

template.name: pter
template.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required

template.name: ptf
template.description: Func prop type

template.name: ptfr
template.description: Func prop type required

template.name: pti
template.description: Is an instance of a class prop type

template.name: ptir
template.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required

template.name: ptnd
template.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array

template.name: ptndr
template.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required

template.name: ptn
template.description: Number prop type

template.name: ptnr
template.description: Number prop type required

template.name: pto
template.description: Object prop type

template.name: ptoo
template.description: An object with property values of a certain type

template.name: ptoor
template.description: An object with property values of a certain type required

template.name: ptoos
template.description: An object whose keys are known ahead of time

template.name: ptoosr
template.description: An object whose keys are known ahead of time required

template.name: ptor
template.description: Object prop type required

template.name: ptet
template.description: An object that could be one of many types

template.name: ptetr
template.description: An object that could be one of many types required

template.name: ptsh
template.description: An object taking on a particular shape

template.name: ptshr
template.description: An object taking on a particular shape required

template.name: pts
template.description: String prop type

template.name: ptsr
template.description: String prop type required

template.name: rpt
template.description: Creates empty propTypes declaration

template.name: rcc
template.description: Creates a React component class with ES6 module system

template.name: rccp
template.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and ES6 module system

template.name: rcfc
template.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and all lifecycle methods and ES6 module system

template.name: rcjc
template.description: Creates a React component class with ES6 module system

template.name: rpc
template.description: Creates a React pure component class with PropTypes and ES6 module system

template.name: rrc
template.description: Creates a React component class connected to redux

template.name: rrdc
template.description: Creates a React component class connected to redux with dispatch

template.name: rsc
template.description: Creates a stateless React component without PropTypes and ES6 module system

template.name: rsf
template.description: Creates a stateless React component as a named function without PropTypes

template.name: rsfp
template.description: Creates a stateless React component as a named function with PropTypes

template.name: rsi
template.description: Creates a stateless React component without PropTypes and ES6 module system but with Implicit Return and props

template.name: rscp
template.description: Creates a stateless React component with PropTypes and ES6 module system

template.name: rwwd
template.description: Creates a React component class with constructor, empty state, proptypes and export in ES6 module system without imports. (Mostly used when React, Proptypes are provided by webpack provide plugin)

template.name: scu
template.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.
